newsitem.title: SLOVENIA: Explosion wrecks bar in Slovenian city.
newsitem.headline: Explosion wrecks bar in Slovenian city.

text.p: An explosion shook the city of Maribor in northeast Slovenia on Tuesday, causing widespread damage to a bar but no one was injured, police said.

"The investigation is still going on. All we know is that an explosive device blew up in a bar in Maribor and that there were no victims," Maribor police chief Srecko Pusnik told Reuters in Ljubljana by telephone.
The building housing the bar was badly damaged and police cordoned off nearby streets to carry out a forensic search of the area, he added.

Pusnik said it was the seventh explosion this year in the area of Maribor, 135 km (80 miles) northeast of Ljubljana, but police were so far unable to connect Tuesday's explosion to the previous blasts.
